• GEL module documentation

GEL is a small library that extends CHAI3D to support deformable models. GEL uses a six degree-of-freedom mass-spring representation. Mass nodes are positioned along the medial axis skeleton of a mesh and are connected together using three dimensional springs which control elongation, flexion and torsion. Interactions between different objects are computed directly from the deformable model using collision spheres which are placed at each node of the skeleton.
